text: geubun-eun hananim-euloseo geubun ioeeneun gyeongbae bad-eul jonjaega eobsnola. jewang, seongseuleousin bun, geu eotteon gyeoljeomdo eobs-eusin bun, anjeon-eul jusineun bun, jikyeobosineun bun, gajang jon-eomhasin bun, wiabhasineun bun, hollo widaehasin bun. geudeul-i (geubunkke) daedeunghan jonjaeleul duna hananim-eun wanbyeoghasin bun-ila
